timeline.body:
Let's copy the Javadoc from `ContainerBuildPlan`. ```suggestion * Adds a desired image platform (OS and architecture pair). If the base image reference is a * Docker manifest list or an OCI image index, an image builder may select the base image * matching the given platform. If the base image reference is an image manifest, an image * builder may ignore the given platform and use the platform of the base image or may decide to * raise on error. * *

Note that a new build plan starts with "amd64/linux" as the default platform. If you want * to reset the default platform instead of adding a new one, use {@link #setPlatforms(Set)}. ```

timeline.bodyHTML:
Let's copy the Javadoc from ContainerBuildPlan.

Suggested change
* Adds a platform to the platforms configurations for the container.
* Adds a desired image platform (OS and architecture pair). If the base image reference is a
* Docker manifest list or an OCI image index, an image builder may select the base image
* matching the given platform. If the base image reference is an image manifest, an image
* builder may ignore the given platform and use the platform of the base image or may decide to
* raise on error.
*
* <p>Note that a new build plan starts with "amd64/linux" as the default platform. If you want
* to reset the default platform instead of adding a new one, use {@link #setPlatforms(Set)}.
